underlying_goal: Create a formal spec for adding external post analytics tracking to the platform, where users can manually add posts not created through the platform and track their analytics
friction_detail: Claude initially assumed the feature would live on the posts page; user corrected that it should be on the analytics page since posts page is for platform-created content only.
brief_summary: User wanted a spec for external post analytics tracking; Claude researched the codebase, brainstormed UX placement with the user, wrote a formal spec, and began creating a Linear issue â€” mostly achieved with one course correction on feature placement.
